topics.body:
So here's a little context for this. The demon girl is named Patty. Apparently before the demon fight she and Gash had a bit of a thing. They didn't really have a thing and Patty is really just crushing on Gash hardcore.
[spoiler]I never noticed it during my first reading but Patty's panties have Gash's FACE on them. Freaky.
!img.bato.to/comics/2011/10/25/k/read4ea71e43536d4/Konjiki.No.Gash%21%21-v11ch100pg122%5BNull%5D.png![/spoiler]

topics.body:

...What? Since This thread got really fancy this morning, I figured that I should wear clothes that match.

[spoiler]I don't even like tea.[/spoiler]
